body.content:
Attn:

My name is diplomat Egobia Steven.I am with your ATM CARD as
programmed with $5.5m as assigned for covid19 relief package to you.

You are required to come and pick your ATM CARD in our office
address:34 Marina P.M.B 12866 Lagos Nigeria

Attach is  the specimen of the ATM CARD,while the original copy of the
ATM CARD  will be handed over to you if you come over to our office to
pick your ATM CARD in our above listed office address.


Awaiting your response

Regards,

Diplomat Egobia Steven
